ast.name: Polls
ast.description: Polls is a simple API allowing consumers to view polls and vote in them. You can view this documentation over at [Apiary](http://docs.pollshypermedia.apiary.io/).

resources.name: Polls API Root
resources.description: This resource does not have any attributes. Instead it offers the initial API affordances.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of questions to return

actions.name: Create a New Question
actions.description:
You may create your own question using this action. It takes a JSON object containing a question and a collection of answers in the form of choices.

+ question (string) - The question

+ choices (array[string]) - A collection of choices.

resourceGroups.name: Question
resourceGroups.description: Resources related to questions in the API.

resources.name: Question
resources.description:
A Question object has the following attributes:

+ question

+ published_at - An ISO8601 date when the question was published.

+ url

+ choices - An array of Choice objects.

parameters.name: question_id
parameters.description: ID of the Question in form of an integer

parameters.name: question_id
parameters.description: ID of the Question in form of an integer

parameters.name: choice_id
parameters.description: ID of the Choice in form of an integer

actions.name: Vote on a Choice
actions.description: This action allows you to vote on a question's choice.
